name: Prison of the Magi: Chapter Zero
name_original: Prison of the Magi: Chapter Zero
description:
Escape the void, trust nothing.

-1 player adventure game with cosmic horror vibes

-Keyboard and mouse recommended, game pad compatible 

-More chapters coming soon with harder challenges and spicier spooks. 

-Content Warning: claustrophobia 

Designed and Developed by Grant Andrew Ervin
